    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_110980</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_110980</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Binary system and orbit of their stars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Binäres System und Bahn ihrer Sterne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système et l'orbite binaires du leur 
tient le premier rôle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema e órbita binários de suas estrelas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistema ed orbita binari delle loro stelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυαδικές σύστημα και τροχιά των αστεριών τους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema y órbita binarios de sus estrellas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the orbit of star B with respect to star A in a binary system (a) and the orbits of stars A and B with respect to their common centre of mass X (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">binary systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">centre of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Orbits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Bahn von 
Stern B in Bezug auf Stern A in einem binären System (a) und die 
Bahnen von Sternen A und B in Bezug auf ihre geläufige Mitte von 
Masse X (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre l'orbite de tiennent le premier rôle
B en ce qui concerne tiennent le premier rôle A dans un système binaire (a) et
les orbites de tient le premier rôle A et B en ce qui concerne leur centre 
commun de la masse X (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a órbita da estrela B com 
respeito à estrela A em um sistema binário (a) e as órbitas das 
estrelas A e B com respeito a seu centro comum da massa X (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra l'orbita della stella B 
riguardo alla stella A in un sistema binario (a) e le orbite delle 
stelle A e B riguardo al loro centro comune di massa X (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί την τροχιά του αστεριού β 
όσον αφορά το αστέρι Α σε ένα δυαδικό σύστημα (α) και τις 
τροχιές των αστεριών Α και β όσον αφορά το κοινό κέντρο μάζας 
τους Χ (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la órbita de la estrella B 
con respecto a la estrella A en un sistema binario (a) y las órbitas 
de las estrellas A y B con respecto a su centro común de la masa X 
(b).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">binäre Systeme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstände</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tient le premier rôle</string>
          </keyword>
